mapper.select:
SELECT GUID as "guid", LOGIN_ID as "loginId", PAGE_CODE as "pageCode", CREATE_TIME as "createTime" FROM T_SYS_FAVORITES
and GUID = #{guid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_SYS_FAVORITES ( GUID, LOGIN_ID, PAGE_CODE, CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{guid, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{loginId, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{pageCode, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=DATE,typeHandler=DateHandler} )
